Use natural alternatives: People can use natural alternatives to soap, such as baking soda, vinegar, and lemon juice to clean their bodies. These ingredients can be used to wash the body, wash the hair, and even clean the teeth.

Use a waterless cleaning product: There are waterless cleaning products available in the market that can be used to clean the body. These products are made from natural ingredients and are free from harmful chemicals.
Use a steam cleaner: A steam cleaner can be used to clean the body by spraying steam onto the skin. This can help to remove dirt and sweat from the skin.
Use a dry brush: A dry brush can be used to remove dirt and dead skin cells from the body. This can help to keep the skin clean and healthy.
Use a salt scrub: A salt scrub can be made by mixing salt with a natural oil such as coconut oil or olive oil. This can be used to clean the body and exfoliate the skin.
